mapper.select: SELECT G.GAME_NO,G.GAME_DATE,G.GAME_TIME,G.TEAM_A,G.TEAM_B,P.MATCH_PREDICT_DECISION,P.MEMBER_ID FROM MATCH_PREDICT P JOIN GAME G ON P.GAME_NO = G.GAME_NO WHERE P.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATCH_PREDICT (GAME_NO,MEMBER_ID,MATCH_PREDICT_NO, MATCH_PREDICT_DECISION, REG_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_GAME_NO.NEXTVAL,'user1', SEQ_MATCH_PREDICT.NEXTVAL, #{matchPredictDecision}, SYSDATE)
